product_overview: portofolio-antigravity is a modern, immersive portfolio website built with Next.js 16, designed to showcase professional skills, experience, projects, and blog content with an integrated admin dashboard for content management. It features advanced 3D graphics, smooth animations, and comprehensive SEO and security measures to provide an engaging and secure user experience.
core_goals: Provide a professional online presence that demonstrates technical expertise and creativity
Showcase portfolio projects, professional experience, and skills in a visually engaging way
Enable potential clients, employers, and collaborators to easily explore and connect
Allow secure and efficient management of portfolio content via an admin dashboard
Offer a responsive, accessible, and optimized user experience with dark/light theme support
key_features: Landing page with animated hero section featuring 3D Earth background and dynamic text
About section with detailed biography, education, achievements, and community involvement
Skills section with interactive, categorized skill displays and proficiency levels
Projects section showcasing portfolio projects with images, tech stack tags, demo and repo links
Experience timeline with detailed job roles, companies, and durations
Blog section supporting markdown content rendering, excerpts, and cover images
Contact form with validation and backend API for message submission
Admin authentication with secure login and session management
Admin dashboard for CRUD content management: projects, skills, experience, blog posts, and messages
Interactive 3D Earth globe with light/dark mode
SEO configurations including sitemap and robots.txt
Dark and light theme switching with smooth animations
user_flow_summary: Visitors land on the homepage and scroll through sections: hero, about, skills, projects, experience, blog, and contact
Users interact with project cards, blog articles, and send messages via the contact form
Admins log in securely via the authentication system
Admin users access dashboard to create, update, delete portfolio content and manage incoming messages
Admins log out securely after managing content
validation_criteria: All public sections render correctly with dynamic content and animations
Contact form input validation enforces required fields and formats
Authentication restricts access to admin dashboard and protected API routes
Admin CRUD operations correctly update the database and UI reflects changes
3D Earth and animations perform smoothly across supported devices and themes
SEO metadata and sitemap generate correctly and are accessible
Database schema enforces data integrity and relationships
API endpoints respond with appropriate success and error statuses
Dark/light theme toggles correctly across all pages and components
Multi-language support renders localized content based on user preference or locale
